docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-9 War News Summary B2 Nigerian Political Uprising Stopping the Flow of Oil An uprising by a well-armed ethnic Nigerian militia seeking to wrest power from the local government has stanched the flow of 800,000 barrels of crude oil a day, or 40 percent of this country's yield. Multinational companies have evacuated all staff members and shut all facilities. A3
